name: rtc-plugin-nicta-ios
description: An iOS integration plugin for getting WebRTC working on an iOS device using webkit

scripts.browserify: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s RTC.IOS --debug | exorcist dist/rtc-ios.js.map > dist/rtc-ios.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs --screw-ie8 --mangle --compress --in-source-map dist/rtc-ios.js.map --source-map-include-sources --source-map dist/rtc-ios.min.js.map --source-map-url rtc.min.js.map --output dist/rtc-ios.min.js dist/rtc-ios.js
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run uglify

author: Damon Oehlman <damon.oehlman@nicta.com.au>
